(A) zero
(B) one
(C) two
(D) three
(E) four
(F) five
(G) six

(A) zero
(B) one
(C) two
(D) three

(F) five
(G) six

(E) four
(F) five
(G) six

question:
On the desk, there are two turquoise fidget spinners, one red pair of sunglasses, three purple fidget spinners, and three turquoise pairs of sunglasses. If I remove all the turquoise things from the desk, how many pairs of sunglasses remain on it?
Options:
(A) zero
(B) one
(C) two
(D) three
(E) four
(F) five
(G) six
(H) seven
(I) eight
(J) nine
(K) ten
(L) eleven
(M) twelve
(N) thirteen
(O) fourteen
(P) fifteen
(Q) sixteen
